name: Papagiannakis, A.T., et al. 2006.  Pavement: Appendix C. Structural and Climatic Input, Structure Asphalt Concrete Pavement
description:
DESCRIPTION
Used only to calculate asphalt weight, Unit weight of Structure Asphalt Concrete Pavement 

FULL CITATION
Papagiannakis, A.T., Bracher, M., Li, J., Jackson, N.  (2006).  Pavement: Appendix C. Structural and Climatic Input, Structure Asphalt Concrete Pavement.
